50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Prophet [SAW] used to say: 'Allahumma (O Allah,)' and he mentioned the supplication, and said at the end, 'A'udhu bika an ughtala min tahti (and I seek refuge with You from being swallowed up from beneath me)

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from Being Swallowed up by the Earth
